content.html: Unlike other devs, I DON'T rewrite my blog every year. In fact, I hadn't upgraded most of the pkgs for years. It was out of hand. ðŸ˜… Today, I YOLO upgraded every pkg to latest, and honestly, it mostly kept working. ðŸ˜‚ Found & fixed the stuff that broke pretty easily, too.
content.value:
Unlike other devs, I DON'T rewrite my blog every year. In fact, I hadn't upgraded most of the pkgs for years. It was out of hand. ðŸ˜…

Today, I YOLO upgraded every pkg to latest, and honestly, it mostly kept working. ðŸ˜‚

Found & fixed the stuff that broke pretty easily, too.
